author: Fextralife
description:
Blades of Fire Gameplay Preview - God of War With Soulslike Combat
Play the Demo Now!👉 https://store.epicgames.com/p/blades-of-fire-demo-78b5d3
https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9n39thqbzpjj
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10011854/
Sponsored by:  MercurySteam & 505 Games

In this Fextralife First Look video, we're going to be taking a look at a new Action Adventure game with a little bit of Dark Soul sprinkled in that is being developed by Mercury Steam and published by 505 Games, and that is Blades of Fire. We're going to cover the basics of the game, including the story, setting, gameplay features, etc. 

Timestamp
0:00 - Blades of Fire Hands-On Overview
0:56 - Story and Setting
2:13 - Gameplay and Combat
7:38 - Crafting
10:00 - Final Thoughts
